data.title: Primeval: A Rip in Time
data.meta_description: Experience the thrill of the chase, the terror of the unknown, the brilliance of Cutter and his team in these fantastic novelisations from Puffin. Hugely collectable these books will be tracked down by Primeval fans.
data.text:
Sign up to the Puffin newsletter

Stories, ideas and giveaways to help you spark young imaginations

By signing up, I confirm that I'm over 16. To find out what personal data we collect and how we use it, please visit our Privacy Policy
